trigger.expression: {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan1.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan2.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan3.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan4.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan5.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan6.last()}=0 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:Fan7.last()}=0

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:02-CPU1.last()}>70 or {Template IPMI HP ProLiant XL420 Gen9:03-CPU2.last()}>70
trigger.name: Error Temp CPU
